content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
I'm a full time mom to two beautiful boys. I enjoy horseback riding and listening to Justin Timberlake. What about you?
I'm a psychology major and a huge fan of broadway shows. I also love to travel and I'm a huge Steelers fan!
That's so cool! I love broadway shows too! I've seen Hamilton, The Lion King, and The Book of Mormon. What's your favorite show?
I love Hamilton! I've seen it twice and I'm hoping to see it again soon. My other favorite show is Wicked.
Those are both great shows! I've been wanting to see Wicked for a while now.
You should definitely check it out! It's amazing!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel! I've been to all over the world and I'm always looking for new places to go. I also love to go to the movies and I'm a huge fan of the Pittsburgh Steelers.
That's so cool! I've never been to Pittsburgh, but I've always wanted to go. I love watching football too! I'm a big fan of the Dallas Cowboys.
Oh, that's too bad! Pittsburgh is a great city. I hope you can make it there one day. And I'm not really a fan of the Cowboys, but I can respect their team.
Yeah, I'm not sure I'll ever be able to make it to Pittsburgh, but I'll keep dreaming! And I'm glad we can agree to disagree about the Cowboys!
Haha, me too!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a psychology major and I work part-time as a tutor.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in psychology. What do you like about it?
I like that it's a field that studies the human mind. I think it's fascinating to learn about how people think and feel.
That does sound really interesting! I'm glad you're enjoying your major.
Thank you!
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to graduate school, but I'm not sure what I want to specialize in.
That's okay. You have plenty of time to figure it out.
Thanks! I hope so.
I'm sure you'll do great!
